website_summaries.verdict: Comfort enough for all-day wear and clean styling describe these Atwood sneakers by Vans. The shoes’ minimalist and sleek design just works, and they look even better in person.Vans Atwood sneakers are lightweight, breathable, and priced affordably. However, according to several reviews, the soles tend to fall apart easily, and the uppers’ canvas fabric does not hold up well to strenuous skating exercises. They are easily some of the most comfortable kicks one can easily wear.
pros: Vans Atwood Lows are comfortable sneakers that are great to walk around in or to use for long hours at work, many users have reported
The style of the low-top sneakers habe gotten plenty of rave reviews from people who like the footwears’ fresh, clean look
Two persons have remarked that these low-top kicks are versatile because they can be worn dressed up or down
Vans Atwood sneakers provide a great fit even for wide-footed users, according to several testers
Some purchasers have stated that the colorways of Vans Atwood shoes go with everything, and the shades look even better in person
The low-top sneakers have flexible and grippy soles that give good board feel, a small number of users have approvingly said
Vans Atwood sneakers are lightweight and breathe pretty well, a few individuals have commented
A couple of consumers have been pleased to find out that these casual footwears are deep enough to accommodate custom orthotics
One person calls the Atwood silhouette by Vans’ price as “ridiculously inexpensive” while another commended the affordable price for such “all-around great chill shoes.”
cons: The lifestyle sneakers need to be broken in, according to several persons
A good number of people have complained that the Vans Atwood low-tops wore out quickly, with soles started separating from the canvas after only a short period of use
A few reviewers feel that Vans Atwoods aren’t good as skate shoes, but are otherwise excellent as lifestyle footwear

customer_reviews.title: Last Vans I Ever Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Vans I have bought - and will be the last. I bought these pair last year, but only started wearing them over the past few months. They have never gotten wet or been mistreated in any way; yet the colour is fading and therefore making them look shoddy and cheap. I've had other brands in the past... had a pair of Globes for almost 6 years with no loss of colour at all. Comfortable, but I will not be purchasing this brand again due to their fading issue.
customer_reviews.author: Boomusic

customer_reviews.title: Vans Men's Atwood Canvas Total Black Low-Top Sneakers (UK SIZE 12)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered online via Amazon website seamlessly. Delivered on time. Package was intact. The shoes themselves arrived intact. The colour is the same colour as advertised. I have owned numerous pairs of Vans and they're great, if you look after them, they can last a while. They fit well and are comfortable. I would purchase these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Simon-Matthew

customer_reviews.title: My 14 yr old is very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old is very happy with these. They look good, fit well and last well. Love the fact that they do half sizes too. He is a very active boy and these last till he grows out of them. This will be the 3rd set he's had and haven't had any problems. Happy child, happy mam.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Gemma

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a slightly bigger size as i am inbetween sizes and didnt want it to be too tight getting the exact size so went for .5 bigger and they are big, but not unbearably big so they are just as i wanted. They are sturdy and come in the condition shown which was a worry. The colour wasnt washed as they usually are fine in pictures but not as shown in real life but these were jet black and of great quality. Would recommend and buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Richards

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable and light shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for myself to wear as a smart casual option. I've worn them for a few days now and find them light and comfortable to wear and not too hot and sweaty. Compared to what I'm used to I find the sole fairly soft and can feel bumps on the floor more than more solid shoes but I can see why given the original purpose of these shoes, giving you good feedback. Overly i like them and they are what I was hopging for.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Trebell

customer_reviews.title: NEVER MACHINE WASH THESE SHOES! It is like kryptonite is to superman!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this is the only shoe to not stay right after wash and dryer. It's my fault I'm sure but I'm surprised they don't test every shoe in the industry to be sure their shoes are up for being machine washed. Its common sense really. I really love my vans, but I figured a shoe built for extreme sports lime skate boarding and offroad bmx riding would be the last shoe to warp, come undone, and shred the shoe support I to what feels like crumpled cardboard. Besides that great shoe. Maybe my machine operates at a higher temperature than most. I would just cold wash in the washer, then air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Temple

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes for the comfort. They fit well, I have a broad foot, allow my bunions enough space, whilst still hugging the rest of my foot. The soles are springy. They are lightweight. It took a couple of days to get used to wearing them, because the stretchy fabric upper can allow your foot to slip off the sole a bit, making you a bit unsteady. Now I don't have that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Curly Clare

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I own
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing canvas shoes, converse and skate shoes all my life, after getting a decent pair though and some proper vans they just feel so much more comfortable, so much more sturdy They're not a very dark black though, I wear mainly back and in a black top and jeans these are a bit lighter in colour, but I guess it helps you see the design more Really comfortable, sturdy, good quality shoes I can only really afford on sale but you can appreciate the difference in quality when you spend a bit more on a decent pair like this
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: BLEW MY MIND
customer_reviews.text: I have two feet. A left foot and a right foot. These shoes came with the exact number of shoes I needed for each foot. One per foot. Blew my mind. If you have two feet then look no further. However, they came as one left and one right shoe. If you have two left feet or two right feet then they may not be for you. You can check online or with a foot specialist to see what kind of feet you have. I've seen quite a few feet so I just guessed that I have one of each and it worked out this time. Recommend you check with a specialist before buying just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Jono Sharp

customer_reviews.title: These cause bleeding
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I've bought 2 pairs of the same colour and warn them almost everyday - I loved them However this 3rd pair is a huge downgrade to what Vans had previously: - They're really uncomfortable to wear: I have formal shoes more comfortable than these - They rub against my achilles which has caused bleeding. They're meant to be trainers not formal shoes!! Checking Van's website they've recently started doing comfort versions of this shoe at a higher price, so it looks they've upped the price for what they use to be and made a downgraded version at the normal price. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Bad discolouration!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed as the shoes have discoloured after few weeks of use. After a month they look almost completely orange. We have had several pairs of Vans and never seen them discoloured so much. I haven’t wash them or misused them. They’ve just discoloured. I would like a refund or new pair. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MayaG

customer_reviews.title: Fade to grey..
customer_reviews.text: Comfort rating 5-5. All day comfy with good support. I have a wide fitting and so rare to find decent sneakers that fit me so well. Durability 2-5. Like others have reported, the grey fades and has discoloured so quickly. After only a couple of months use, they look like they have used every day on a beach, with areas where the canvas has turned pink and brown. I would buy these again but a different colour. As contrast I owned a pair of Adidas Nizza lows for three years and this didn’t happen...
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but a little weak
customer_reviews.text: As with most vans these look good, are comfortable to wear but also seem to wear out pretty quickly. The colours in the images are very accurate with the real product matching almost exactly. The fit is as expected (I've had a number of pairs of these before) but as with previous pairs they also wore out in certain places sooner than you'd hope for. All in all pretty good value but worthwhile bearing in mind they might not last too long!
customer_reviews.author: AJLondon

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort, could do with better quality materials/glue/dye
customer_reviews.text: I buy these vans often (in different colours and had the black pair 4 times now) they are comfy and fit my feet shape well. However I have noticed the colour on them fades fast with the last 3 pairs I've had (red, grey +black) . Without doing anything to them. Also my last pair I had under a month and a hole appeared on the top of each shoe in the same place..
customer_reviews.author: Edaj

customer_reviews.title: good value for money
customer_reviews.text: I have owned and worn these for about a month. I have not seen any fading in the canvas as pointed out in other reviews. (Any fading in the black colour would probably lend itself to overall aesthetic appeal IMO as these are casual) The soles do not have much give in them, but this is to be expected. (There are cheap silicon sole inserts available here if you need them) Overall, I am very happy with fit/comfort/appearance. I'm also happy with durability as they seem well made and robust.. based on wearing them for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit for wider feet, but solidly built.
customer_reviews.text: The usual mistake - bigger sizes are made longer but no wider or higher across the laces, so these are like size 9 or 10 but with too much extra length, more like a 12. (Should be 11) I thought they'd be ok but they're a bit like clown shoes, I'm tripping over the toes when I walk if there's a rise in the floor. They're solidly built and good quality otherwise, and probably fine if you have very average shaped feet.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Serlin

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers for everyday wear
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant price great trainers. Had pairs before so knew what to expect. I have had trainers in the past that were too tight despite the size, but these are a perfect fit both width and length. Got these in the sale along with a few others. All arrived promptly, are of expected fantastic quality. Would highly recommend to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a pair of Vans for ages but not prepared to pay full price so snapped these up at the sale price. Worn once and doubt I’ll wear them again. Easily the most uncomfortable footwear I’ve ever purchased. Had them on for 4 hours and couldn’t wait to get them off. No support or cushioning. You may as well be barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: N A Barker

customer_reviews.title: Not built how they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I love Vans for their timeless look/style but the quality of the build feels pretty shoddy nowadays. I'm sure I'm not the only person to notice this. For example the vulcanised sole is already separating from the main shoe and the rigid material which keeps the back of the heel section supported has already fallen apart inside (and I can now feel sharp bits of plastic pushing against the back of my achilles tendon). Real shame as I will always stand by the design of vans - but I think I will be looking to other shoes for better durability/lifespan in the future...
customer_reviews.author: A. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Vans, the classic shoes of skateboarders for years!
customer_reviews.text: Classic vans style and comfort for a reasonable price! I've bought several pairs of atwoods in the past and they are always comfortable to wear and fit superbly, the sole of the shoe is hard-wearing and long lasting, being able to wear them all day is easy, there's not cut corners, these shows are designed for skateboarders and it shows. A great shoe, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: UnboxedReviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing but not so comfortable for wider feet. I would maybe size up. Got them for 25 so it's a steal, but it took a lot of painful walking to break them in and I wouldn't really wear them if I planning to ealk more than 3 kilometers
customer_reviews.author: Bartô N.

customer_reviews.title: My most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Already had the Atwood in blue and wanted another colour to go with new trousers just purchased. Tried Vans own shop and John Lewis but nothing I liked. Tried another JL and found grey, just what I wanted but no stock. Went online, found loads and ordered my size from Amazon, arrived in 2 days. I’m a great believer in the High Street but they must try harder. Really pleased with Vans Atwood which have to be my most comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: emenjayell

customer_reviews.title: Fit, and Comftable
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a pair, so decided to treat myself, thay arrived early, delievery guy followed my instructions excatly were to leave as I wasn't expecting them so soon, so I was pleased as wasn't home, thay fit very comfortably and I'm very pleased with my Vans,
customer_reviews.author: Tina Hucker

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and sleek. Been wearing them for a week or two now and they are a solid fit for a good price. I'm glad they offer a size 9.5 because I am somewhere between 9 and 10 so 9.5 ended up as exactly what I needed. As expected, I got a blister on the back of my left foot because that's just a part of getting new shoes really, nothing a blister plaster can't handle. Will try to update review when they've broken beyond repair (hopefully not for a while).
customer_reviews.author: Naked Snake

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits bad.
customer_reviews.text: Damn do these vans look great. Don’t they always? I’m a size 10.5. I always buy size 11 so that the shoes fit better and I haven’t had a problem for 12 years now until I purchased these vans. They refuse to fit around my feet. They are so painful to put on. My recommendation: whatever size you usually wear, make it 1 bigger when purchasing these good looking bad boys. So if you’re 9, buy 10 or your poor feet will hate you forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: I love Vans, live in them. So when I saw these for just over £20 I had to buy them. They're as all my others - comfortable, fit well, colour lovely. I can't say anything bad about them. They've gone back up to £29.99 I believe, but that's still so much less expensive than other shops selling them at cheapest £50! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit just right.
customer_reviews.text: My son was really happy when he received his new van trainers. Their were in the sales and I just bought them just in time, before they went back to normal price. Comfortable and fit just right. Definitely recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Thought vans where good quality
customer_reviews.text: Less than two weeks and the base is coming away from the shoe! See photo! 40quid and this should not happen!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Another pair to the collection
customer_reviews.text: Another pair of vans to my partners collection. He said they are very comfortable and go with any sorts of clothes. I think they can be dressed up or down. They also wash well when it comes to washing them. Great value and great fit
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Favourite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Son, (who has had two pairs of these) and had worn them so much,needed another new pair! He loves these has they are so comfy,and last well. I am so glad they are still selling this particular shoe,has they are his favourite! very happy customer*****
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: accurate size chart
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Vans for decades and sometimes the lasts can be unpredictable. Use this size chart based on your European size, for example I'm a 41 - which varies between a US 10 or a UK 8.5. Easy to get the wrong size if you aren't careful. Love the shoe and looking forward to this new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, amazing value, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes and a welcomed replscement to my previous pair. I purchased these shoes in the expectation that they have a longer life span as my previous shoes had a hole in the bottom from wear after 2 months of use. Let's see how these do.
customer_reviews.author: FunkyCrunchy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Not the first time I’ve had Vans and there are good reasons for buying again. Stylish in an understated way, very comfortable from day one and quite durable for this type of shoe. Delighted with my new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Top Banana

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: They're such a good brand, they fit amazingly and they're so comfortable! It's May 2020 now and they're still functioning, and considering I wear them every single day they're really sturdy. I always go for this same brand and make because they're so comfortable and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dionne Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pair of shoes, Extremely Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Vans, fit is as expected and they seem to be of a very high quality build, I have just one minor gripe and that is the laces on both shoes are way too long for my liking, I'd prefer them about 20 cm shorter as they regularly come loose or get caught on things, making me hesitant to ever run whilst wearing them should that situation ever arise, however that is just one minor fault in an otherwise perfect pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Geary

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase but beware sizing
customer_reviews.text: I like these and they seem well made and robust but I'd advise ordering the size up. I ordered the 6.5 but they are not that roomy. Wish I'd ordered the 7 instead. Nice trainers though
customer_reviews.author: Dyllan Connor

customer_reviews.title: They are good shoes
customer_reviews.text: Only mild downside is the laces they came with are slightly elasticated so can get really tight and tricky to undo if you're not careful. The oxblood ones I had bought previously had laces with no elasticity. Guess I should try and be super cool and tie them in such a way that I can slip them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: slalFe

customer_reviews.title: Vans Men's Atwood Canvas Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Yes, we like these, we like them a lot. They are a pair of shoes, black and white and most importantly, they don't leak when it rains. Word from the wise, at some point, they WILL wear out, be ready for that moment and don't complain when it happens like some...
customer_reviews.author: Matt Kent

customer_reviews.title: Love these Vans
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. Never bought Vans before but saw these listed on hot deals for really good price. I nearly bought something similar from next but then saw Vans for similar price. These are so comfy and feel so good. I love the look and colour too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: these are brilliant, come in 1/2 sizes which is just what I need.really hard to find. fit like a glove, really comfortable will definately buy again. so tempted to get another pair now. (gotta find some restraint).
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Looks over function
customer_reviews.text: Very nice trainers but sole padding could be thicker. I will get some to put in as my feet were getting sore after a 15minute walk into town. Otherwise nice style and look well made.
customer_reviews.author: T Gamble

customer_reviews.title: Worry not other shoe dwellers!
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit I was a little worried about shoe size difference moving over from a pair of converse but I took the risk and decided to get the same size 8.5 and to my surprise it was exactly the same. Shoes are comfortable, no back track on ankles even when first put on - unlike some others - making it a new go to for myself. I'm satisfied that's for sure, I definitely recommend this to those needing a good quality shoe at an affordable and I'll say, pretty reasonable price at that.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Come up far too small
customer_reviews.text: Comes up really really small, no support so had to order insoles as I use them as work shoes and am stood up all day. Already used them before I realised they were too small and now am stuck with £35 shoes that are too small with no support for work all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price, comfortable & fits well
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time & no issues once I tried them on. As good a fit as some of my more expensive shoes. This one is actually more comfortable & slightly sturdier than my Chucks, which cost more. I suffer from having lower arches in my feet, due to bad posture & over-compensating from sporting injuries, that causes me a lot of grief. These shoes support my feet well & I don’t have issues walking around in them or after taking them off. Also good in summer, so my feet don’t sweat as much & they feel durable. Good purchase, great price!
customer_reviews.author: R41han77

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional comfort!
customer_reviews.text: These came next day and are exceptionally comfortable. I was looking to replace a duff old pair of shoes i was using and the price point was perfect. i will probably end up buying another pair. I cannot tell you how comfortable these are. Stop looking at reviews and buy a pair.
customer_reviews.author: John Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, more waterproof than you'd expect, hard-waring. Just all round great really. Might just get another pair of these when I kill these... though they're holding up far better than the 10s of pairs of other skateshoes I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: VANS Quality
customer_reviews.text: VANS are the best built sneekers out there and looked after they last well. The Atwood is one of the heavier and more solid VANS designs giving more foot support and arch support than the classic sneakers. I wont buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as always from Vans
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing size 7 Vans for many years now, so comfy and great quality, love this colour and super price as they were reduced in the pick of the day, so bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes if the price is right
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes and well worth the money when they are on sale, full price is a bit too much. These are just basic shoes so you are just paying for the named label.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Man with Vans!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material and we'll made. Fits as expected and delivery time was great. Great price for a pair of Vans! Can't go wrong even if it only lasted 6 months IMO
customer_reviews.author: Boom!

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoe glued flat soul my last purches from vans ever
customer_reviews.text: For vans this is terrible a tennis shoe glued to a flatbottom soulless soul I wore nothing but vans this will be my last buy etnies from now on
customer_reviews.author: Incoming75

customer_reviews.title: Smart and strong
customer_reviews.text: Well to be honest, they are for a Christmas present for my son, I have measured them with his other shoes, and they seem to be a great fit, they are really smart, and great for the money
customer_reviews.author: elaine love

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on the quick as ones I originally wanted weren’t in stock, but these are just perfect! Lovely colour and great fit! Should have been my first preference.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I wear vans all the time and took a chance on these which were cheaper than what I normally spend on vans. These arrived and were far to tight, had to return
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Waring

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable for a diabetic.
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic I was told by my diabetic nurse to wear comfortable shoes to protect my feet. For the last few years I have used Vans at work and they are simply the best. So comfortable and well made. I won't use any other make.
customer_reviews.author: The Bearded Trio

customer_reviews.title: Top choice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled in good condition. I am very pleased with the choice of style and maker who's shoes are very respected, a point I later found out when wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Evans

customer_reviews.title: Off the wall. Got myself these Vans.
customer_reviews.text: Feel like a teenager again. Great, light and comfy. How long will they last only time will tell. ‐--------- Price I paid £ 29.99 ( April 2020)
customer_reviews.author: snuffleupagus

customer_reviews.title: Spot on
customer_reviews.text: I bought a half size bigger than usual and they seem feel great. It’s what I love about vans they seem to fit my feet really well
customer_reviews.author: Woofdog

customer_reviews.title: I’m pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for less then a month now, but there are white threads coming off from inside the shoe which normally happens with much older shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Selva

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - but sizing is on the big side!
customer_reviews.text: VANS are a quality product. The sizing does seem to come up big so we always need to order one size down. Apart from that we love them.
customer_reviews.author: MandyJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value great looks
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes Excellent price, purchased in red and blue for around £20 each when on offer BE Aware, on both occasions ordered 9 1/2 opposed to my normal size of 9, these appear to be US sizes which are slightly smaller so best order 1/2 or even a size higher than you are
customer_reviews.author: Lyndy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He liked them and they were worn all through summer and still look good. The fit was as expected we ordered a size 10 and they fit well. A great colour too. They arrived fast too
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service from transaction to receipt of delivery. I love the tracking system for estimated time for delivery. Courier polite and professional. I love my new Vans. Very comfortable from first wear. I highly recommend this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: acwildfire

customer_reviews.title: Vans for life
customer_reviews.text: Vans are relatively reliable on sizing and have consistent materials used so buying online saves a trip to the shop. They arrived as expected with a printed note from the seller which was a lovely touch.
customer_reviews.author: John Carney

customer_reviews.title: good value good quality
customer_reviews.text: Got them on offer for about £20. Absolute bargain, lovely looking shoes and fit me perfectly, had them a week or so and no blisters etc.
customer_reviews.author: moo

customer_reviews.title: sole came apart
customer_reviews.text: 3 months wear saw the soles come off (left), and a hole developed in the sole of the other.
customer_reviews.author: AlisonN

customer_reviews.title: 6 years later, i keep buying these.
customer_reviews.text: can rate them highly enough, have had the same shoes for the last 6 years, not the same, but the same, basically each pair last me around 6 months, because they become to dirty i have to throw them away, but 6 years in and i am buyin the exact same shoe, yes its that comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Ali M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice beer garden pumps
customer_reviews.text: The pumps are lovely and comfortable and look great with shorts for around a pool on holiday or in a beer garden in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: JC Liverpool

customer_reviews.title: Strong Sturdy and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Although I don't normally wear this type of shoe I fancied a change. I love them, they are of good quality and fit really well. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of Vans and I must say I'm impressed. A perfect fit and very comfortable. I suffer from fallen arches and a thing where I've got extra bone in my heel and these actually help. Bought these during Prime Day so saved a few ££ but I would have paid full price if I'd seen them before. Stylish and comfy would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shaneee

customer_reviews.title: Skate shoes for you
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent price and quality. I love these at the best of times, my god knows how many pairs I have had in 30+ years.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Not instantly falling apart
customer_reviews.text: The last few pairs of shoes I've owned, some being "top brands", have all fallen part within a few months. I've had these for a while now and they're still going strong. The soles are slowly getting bald but I think these will last me a year total before I buy a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Scott J Irvine

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these wouldn't be great due to the price but I honestly can't complain. Looks and feels decent to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Love me Vans...
customer_reviews.text: Love this style of Vans. You can’t really find them on the high street. Second pair from this seller also brought the black ones, if you catch the sales right you can grab a bargain. Super fast 💨 delivery brilliant product 💯 percent on both counts.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes at a great price Fit as expected, good quality, very happy son. Last we’ll
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Classics
customer_reviews.text: Love this version of the vans shoe been wearing them for years. Amazon seems to be the only place I can find Atwoods anymore 😀👍🏼😀. Great price, quick delivery look cool with shorts and jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rowley

customer_reviews.title: As comfortable as ever
customer_reviews.text: These arrived really quickly. They fit comfortably. They do the job. Will probably order different colours
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice product some size variation as compared to the other big brand Half a size smaller will help
customer_reviews.author: RAAJ SELLAMUTHU

customer_reviews.title: Always fit perfectly and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfect and are really comfy, like the black/black ones as they last a bit longer. Can’t see the marks
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O.

customer_reviews.title: Quality did not meet standards this time.
customer_reviews.text: bought these shoes late June, however the heels of the shoes are destroyed to the point they no longer hold their shape well. the material has just deteriorated. I've never had this problem before except with this one pair...
customer_reviews.author: Kieran Erskine-harkness

customer_reviews.title: Decent 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Normally a 12 so ordered a 12. Probably a size or a half to big! Go half a size smaller if you can! Overall, a decent product and a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Dan.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, high quality, spot on sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon's size listing for this product was spot on, the shoes fit perfectly and are of high quality. You can't really go wrong with a well known brand name such as Vans, I will definitely be purchasing another pair of these shoes in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Baker

customer_reviews.title: non branded High Street shoes better
customer_reviews.text: The quality isn't great, I got these for my teenage son and he was not impressed, you can get similar shoes from the high street for a fraction of the pricem
customer_reviews.author: zreen

customer_reviews.title: Great but grey fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and super comfortable as standard with Vans. Grey colour has faded really quick though and they've gone a sort of yellowish brown. Would buy again but in a different colour.
customer_reviews.author: Ne0nNightmare

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great value and really comfortable shoe. Not my first pair of Vans and certainly not my last.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I then bought another pair for my son. So comfortable and look great. Fabulous fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love Vans. I know they can be flimsy at times though, but they're comfortable shoes after all, not work boots. This pair was quite cheap too!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy them in grey
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always worn atwoods, love them, always bought black so I though “hey let’s switch it up and get grey!” DONT! They’re just over a month old and they’re completely discoloured around the soles, so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Grey

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes, easy and simple is overlooked. These are great, and are actually even more comfortable that I had anticipated. Sizing is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Fawlty

customer_reviews.title: Decent shoes, have lasted me a year
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look nice and have lasted me a year, the only reason I'm getting new ones is that they're getting slightly discoloured and there's a hole at the top of the shoe where the different parts of the shoe rub (as seen in the picture)
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Favourite shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: Atwoods are my fave of all the vans. I have jazzed them up as they are going to be my wedding shoes! So so comfortable :)
customer_reviews.author: carly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to see these shoes. I already owned them in a 9 and they were a tiny bit too tight. I knew a 10 would be too loose, so when I saw the 9 1/2 available and cheaper than anywhere else by £20 I immediately got them. Tempted to buy another pair as I don't like change!
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Turning white
customer_reviews.text: Sizing and comfort of product is fine.. however I've had these between 1 and 2 months now and there turning white.. the black is fading and they look awful. I only wear them in the office at work. Why are they getting so bad is so little time
customer_reviews.author: rhys

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, happy with this deal as I bought it on sale.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as it was on sale as well. Looks amazing, good quality, original product. Nothing to add, vans is a super brand of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Smadoiu

customer_reviews.title: A bit naff
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable but fine if you're not out long (which most people aren't at the moment!)
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are good basic black shoes that my daughter wears for school. They are sturdy, durable and a very good fit. All in all I’m very pleased
customer_reviews.author: E. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Absolute steal at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Authentic quality product with classic styling at rock bottom price, extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Edwards

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are off the wall!
customer_reviews.text: Great bonding on the high sides, making these the go to guys for all those demanding days on a board. Won’t wear out like your average sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Adams

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoe. Robust and appears well made. Fit as expected and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son lives in Vanna regardless of the weather and now this pair seem glued to his feet so he must like them.
customer_reviews.author: miss k hoone
